item.title: 15 Best Ridley Scott Movies, Ranked
item.description: With Gladiator II lighting up the box office, it's worth revisiting the best movies of legendary director Ridley Scott to see where it stacks up.

item.title: I Need DC To Adapt Batman's Evil Joker-Infused Villain Form From The Comics After This Spot-On Live-Action Cosplay
item.description: A brilliant cosplayer brought to life Batman's chilling variant, the Batman Who Laughs, so convincingly that the comment demanded a film adaptation.

item.title: What Happens To Maui's Powers & Tattoos In Moana 2
item.description: A shocking Maui twist in Moana 2 raises all sorts of questions about his tattoos and demigod status in future installments of the Moana franchise.
